title: SKGLView CanvasSize null reference ecxeption
body:
I'm having a problem with SKGLView using 1.68.0 on Android / Xamarin.Forms. When I create the view initially everything works fine, but when I navigate away and back again, rendering fails because SKGLView.CanvasSize throws null reference excpetions.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2269624/52949674-a0072300-3385-11e9-98ab-9c1221ce859a.png)

The stack trace I get is as follows:

>   at SkiaSharp.Views.Android.SKGLTextureViewRenderer.get_CanvasSize () [0x00000] in <a6c14eed3af3471db7c51e05d420f851>:0 
  at SkiaSharp.Views.Android.SKGLTextureView.get_CanvasSize () [0x00000] in <a6c14eed3af3471db7c51e05d420f851>:0 
  at SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.SKGLViewRendererBase`2[TFormsView,TNativeView].OnGetCanvasSize (System.Object sender, SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.GetPropertyValueEventArgs`1[T] e) [0x00007] in <78489ceef2214790aa3f6565a844acc3>:0 
  at (wrapper delegate-invoke) System.EventHandler`1[SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.GetPropertyValueEventArgs`1[SkiaSharp.SKSize]].invoke_void_object_TEventArgs(object,SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.GetPropertyValueEventArgs`1<SkiaSharp.SKSize>)
  at SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.SKGLView.get_CanvasSize () [0x00010] in <78489ceef2214790aa3f6565a844acc3>:0 
  at Moonbase.Apps.Infrastructure.Core.Controls.Canvas.Base.GLCanvasControl.HandleSurfaceChanged (SkiaSharp.SKSurface surface) [0x00002] in C:\Code\Moonbase\Moonbase.Apps\Moonbase.Apps.Infrastructure\Moonbase.Apps.Infrastructure.Core\Controls\Canvas\Base\GLCanvasControl.cs:26 

It sounds a lot like #460 but this issue was fixed back in 1.60.1. 

If I revert to 1.60.3 the issue goes away completely... but I'd prefer to stay current :)

Hope you can help
